title: Aus dem Tagebuch eines Uber-Fahrers
overview: Ben has not yet reached life in his mid-30s - after various failures, he now works as an Uber driver to stay afloat. But instead of finally having his life under control through the new job, the problems of his passengers are now added. The people who take a seat in his back seat inevitably pull Ben into their world and the chaos there: whether it's a relationship crisis, sad family stories, sex talks or criminal machinations: Ben is drawn into it. There is also chaos in Ben's emotional life: he will soon be a father for the first time, which he is very much looking forward to. He still doesn't quite accept that Nadja, the mother of his child, doesn't want to know anything more about him ...Â
